comment: How did this turn out with Gladfield Manuka Smoked malt? Similar to 8Wired's The Big Smoke?

Came our really good. Haven't had the 8Wired one enough to compare, sorry. This version got a silver at the NHC. Bumped up the smoked malt on the next one and I reckon it's better - https://www.brewtoad.com/recipes/manuka-smoked-porter-ii
